item.title: Apropos sharing with the world
item.description: At some point, everyone has something they want to say. The challenge is knowing how to say it, and who to say it to. Family, friends, colleagues - they are all viable and perhaps necessary outlets for pent up genius. But can you trust them? Will they listen? Will they even understand? Are they below you, or do they consider themselves superior? Fortunately for those in a quandary the internet provides a soothing regurgitant.
